basics.name: Oleksandr
basics.label: 15+ years in software development
basics.summary:
Professional C/C++ software developer with solid background  in image, video and audio processing, hardware interaction and control. Experienced in handling massive amounts of data in real time mode.
I am excited by complex mathematical and logical problems. Always trying to find the optimal and the most efficient solution, would it be multithreading, SIMD instructions or non-standard algorithmic decisions. I enjoy an opportunity to disassemble an image or a sound to the very pixels or sound waves, and then construct something new on their basis.
Besides work, I'm a healthy lifestyle enthusiast. I love running, swimming and fitness. I also have a copter and enjoy flying it very much.

work.name: SmartExe
work.summary: Audio/video processing and streaming software development

work.name: ModaStylz
work.summary: Server-side application for custom image transformation

work.name: SSPE Geosystem
work.summary: Full cycle development of the software complex for the digital airborne camera.

projects.name: Airborne camera firmware
projects.description: Refactor, test and fix firmware for the airborne camera
highlights: Check and fix existing C code according to the code convention, create and fix UML diagrams

projects.name: Telicomm
projects.description: Software/hardware complex designed to collect video streams from several sources, process, buffer and restream them on user request
highlights: Handling and processing media stream from surveillance cameras: RTSP streaming, video transcoding, recording and playback, STUN/TURN resolve, jitter buffer implementation

projects.name: Sound detector
projects.description: Application designed to detect specific sound patterns
highlights: Continuously record, process and analyze real time sound, detect specific sound patterns and communicate with the backend

projects.name: ModaStylz
highlights: Server-side software for custom image transformation

projects.name: Aircraft GPS navigation
projects.description: Hardware/software complex designed to provide real time mission tracking for the aircraft pilot. Works in conjunction with position & orientation systems like Applanix, Novatel, IGI, etc
highlights: Design and implement Win32 application from the scratch

projects.name: Digital airborne camera image post processing
projects.description: Software complex designed for radiometric and geometric image correction, various image compression methods, direct geo-referencing using corresponding navigation data
highlights: Design and implement Win32 applications from the scratch

projects.name: Airborne camera gyro stabilizing mount
projects.description: Hardware/software complex designed to minimize residual angles of the aerial camera during a flight. Works in conjunction with position & orientation systems like Applanix, Novatel, IGI, etc
highlights: Design and implement Win32 application from the scratch

projects.name: Digital airborne camera software
projects.description: Software designed to operate digital airborne cameras. Allows user to connect the camera, receive real time image data, adjust various camera parameters, preprocess, compress and store raw image from the CCD sensor
highlights: Design and implement Win32 application from the scratch
